Player History
Drafted in 37th round, 581st overall pick, by Seattle in 2015...
Injured on 4/20/2015 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Was claimed off waivers by San Francisco on 2/10/2017.
Earned first career win on 6/10/2017...
1/31/2018: Gets a new one-year contract worth $685,000 through salary arbitration...
Was claimed off waivers by Kansas City on 7/11/2018.
Had first career hit on 7/15/2018, off Justin Hamlett (SEA)...
1/31/2019: Gets a new one-year contract worth $685,000 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Hit first career homerun on 9/20/2019, off Erik Boyce (SEA)...
9/21/2019: Signed a contract extension with Kansas City, $14,500,000 per year, for 3 years.
